extendedInfo.description: With the Spotify app and a Spotify Premium subscription you can listen to unlimited music on your mobile. Try it free for 48 hours.Premium 48-hour free trialIf you havenât tried Premium before, you can try it for 48-hours, completely free. Just download the app and log in using your Facebook account*. â¨â¨After your trial, you can still listen to your own music, or subscribe to...Spotify PremiumPremium is the top-of-the-range Spotify experience. Now you can sync all your favourite playlists to your phone and listen offline. Or go online and stream anything you like from the Spotify library. Itâs access all areas with Premium.Praise for Spotify- "Spotify is so good" â Mark Zuckerberg - CEO and Founder of Facebook- "The celestial jukebox is no pipe dream; itâs here now." - Time- "Spotify makes music fun again, just like the iPod did nearly 10 years ago." â Billboard.bizSpotify Premium features â¨â¨â¢ Instant access to millions of songs â¨â¢ Stream online â¨â¢ Listen offline â no mobile connection needed â¨â¢ Share music with your friends â¨â¢ Star your favourite tracks â¨â¢ Wirelessly sync your own music to your Android â¨â¢ Create and sync playlists â¨â¢ Send the music youâre enjoying direct to Last.fm & Facebook â¨Love Spotify?Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/spotifyFollow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/spotify* If you donât have log in details - simply register for a free Spotify account on the Spotify website. Full mobile terms of Use & 48-hour free trial terms and conditions can also be found on the Spotify website.

reviews.title: Must own for music lovers
reviews.comment: If you were like me growing up, you used to carry around a giant CD case with 50 of your favorite albums. I owned at least 500 CD\'s. Fast forward to today, I now have access to 2,000,000 albums via my phone. Just about anything I want to listen to, I can. (And do!) Best app I own.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Expensive
reviews.comment: Can only hear music I tag in Shazam with this app. After 2 days I have to pay $11:99 a month! A month! Just to listen to a tagged piece of music. I don\'t think so. And nothing for free for us Aussies. USA yes, why is there that disparity?
reviews.author: Sharon Stone

reviews.title: From 2* to 5*
reviews.comment: I\'m updating my review. Some big improvements in the last few months.  Most notably we have landscape view and notification bar controls for a quick skip or pause.  Some dude posted a clip on YouTube showing how to save offline playlists to the SD card. Works perfectly!  The only thing missing is the ability to upload my own music (Like Google Play Music). Other wise I\'m a happy premium member.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Very good app, polished, quick and provides most the features that the desktop app does... Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: Dimitris Klimis

reviews.title: The stream train!
reviews.comment: Great, fast, useful. Lacking new android slide in menu design, ability to choose default playlist sorting (I.e. I always want recently added) and ability to swipe songs out of the queue. Little things, but they make up my 5th star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good could be better
reviews.comment: Awesome because spotify is great but software wise behind other media players.  Would be good to get auto complete and spell checking for artists names ?
reviews.author: Marcus Woodbridge

reviews.title: Please fix add playlists feature!
reviews.comment: Galaxy s3 should receive updates faster!  Finally got browse which is awesome!  Yet and still can you please make the add playlist work the same way as adding a single song? I want to determine where to add the Playlist. I think that and being able to rearrange playlists permanently as well as rearrange the queue manually via this app will make this app perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One mor thing
reviews.comment: Good spotify ur the right medicine for my lovely music keep it up pls give us access to put the song that we download  to our music player i really lovin it but that  is some thing not enough.
reviews.author: Yen Shen

reviews.title: Cool ~
reviews.comment: So cool \342\231\245 :D just love it ^_^ Well it rocks and my bro also love it. We always use it .
reviews.author: Grace Lu

reviews.comment: Spotify means spot out hiden musics you\'d love to hear. Cool app, easy to navigate and am loving it..thanks to spotify app for bringing thousands of musics just on a soft touch.
reviews.author: JOSEPH JOSHUA

reviews.title: Its cool
reviews.comment: I love this app its cool and you can look for an artist you want
reviews.author: dulce diaz

reviews.title: Good service, good app
reviews.comment: Request: When a notification comes in and plays the sound, just quiet the music and play the sound, instead of stopping it (like how Google Play music does it)  Edit2: And now a shuffle playlist button!! Thank you for finally listening. Edit: SORT BY ARTIST!!! :)  Finally the latest update brought notification controls! Took you guys long enough. Anyways, this app is fantastic, fast, and has a great library. It doesn\'t look quite as nice as Google Play Music but it functions far better.
reviews.author: Colin Reddig

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I have saved so much money on music since I\'ve had spotify and the convenience is unreal. They have almost every band I try to find and have great music discovery tools. The audio quality it great.
reviews.author: Eli Hatch

reviews.title: Well worth the money!
reviews.comment: Love it! Music selection not as big as itunes but still tons to choose from. PLEASE MAKE A LANDSCAPE MODE FOR US WHO ALSO USE IT ON OUR TABLETS! ALSO MAKE IT SO THAT CAN PLAY ON 2 DEVICES AT ONCE!!!
reviews.author: Rasheed Murrell

reviews.title: AWESOME APPLICATION
reviews.comment: I love this app,I installed it then took it for a spin, What a wonderful job on creating a app this easy-to-use,PLUS IT\'S FREE, Again TY. \342\231\241\342\231\245\342\231\245\342\231\241
reviews.author: Carrie Truitt

reviews.title: Sweet app but...
reviews.comment: Please make a tablet optimized version. Love the service but Googles all access is tempting with its well laid out app.
reviews.author: Jade Hart

reviews.title: Perfect! :D
reviews.comment: Thank you! I especially appreciate the notification shade versatility. I love how I can close the app along with even thumbing songs in radio!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I thought this was good until i realized i was using a trial. When the trial expired there was almost nothing I could use it for. The computer version allows you to listen to your playlist with wifi only. But this wont let you listen to it even with wifi. All you can do is listen to the radio. You might as well get pandora unless you plan on spending $5.00 a month on something you can get for free.
reviews.author: Justin Lindsay

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Love this app more than Pandora! Quicker than it. More features. Perfect for music lovers! I\'m never going to uninstall this app! Thank you Spotify.
reviews.author: Brandon Padilla

reviews.title: A Shame
reviews.comment: New update deleted all of my downloaded songs. Now on to re downloading several gigs of music. Shame that I pay monthly and have to deal with this.
reviews.author: Jose Rivera
